name: Oh my Zombie
description:
Oh my Zombie was the very first game, on which I did my first steps into game development. 

After learning a lot about scripting and the Unity engine workflows, I finished the first level and the core game mechanics. 

Today you can playtest what I have crafted, there is also a hidden Level (Screenshots 3+4) which can be found if you are not afraid to doublejump to death :-)

So far enjoy, give me some feedback and if you like, follow me on my gamedev journey. There are more mini-games to come, more informations will be  announced on my blog and YouTube channel in the next weeks and months.

If you're experiencing any bugs or glitches in this game, please let me know in the comment section. I will fix them asap.

Disclaimer:
This Content might be inappropriate  for children. Contains blood, violence and cannibalism. This game is not in development any more. It's purpose is to share some of my previous work with my followers. There are some features in the game which are not fully developed.
